sentences.sentence: Pneumococcal disease is caused by infection with the Streptococcus pneumoniae bacterium.
sentences.translation: 肺炎球菌病是感染肺炎链球菌引起的。

sentences.sentence: Most invasive pneumococcal infections normally occur in the elderly, but in the Denver cases 62 percent were in people age 20 to 59, Schuchat said.
sentences.translation: Schuchat说，大部分的入侵性肺炎球菌感染通常只发生在老年人中，但是在丹佛的病例中，有62%是在年龄在20 - 59的人。

sentences.sentence: To date, 14 countries have already introduced pneumococcal vaccines through the AMC with a further 39 countries expected to introduce before the end of 2013.
sentences.translation: 迄今为止，已有14个国家通过“预付款采购保证”引入肺炎疫苗，并且预计另外39个国家将在2013年年底之前引入该疫苗。
